description:
Capacity for coast-to-coast touring or a week’s worth of groceries. It has a built-in rain cover to protect your stuff, interior pockets and a removable space divider to keep everything organized. For larger jobs, you can lower the front and back gates to accommodate building supplies or fence posts. Designed with a balance point that reduces torque on your bike and an articulated hitch for smooth tracking and cornering, it's a machine for round-the-globe riding or badass bike commuting near home.

  • 2-wheel design keeps the trailer upright and stable, with a balance point that minimizes torque on your bike
  • Inside divider is removable
  • 2 divided mesh pockets provide access to small items
  • 8 interior and 4 exterior D-rings for tying down gear
  • Quickly disassembles for transport and storage
  • Forged aluminum hitch is articulated for excellent handling
  • 16-inch spoked alloy wheels pop off with the push of a button
  • Safety flag included
  • Open size is 83 x 56 x 57cm
  • Folded size is 83 x 55 x 25cm
  • Carrying capacity is 45kg
name: Burley Nomad Cargo Bike Trailer
